Adaptive optimal two-stage designs for clinical trials with one or two endpoints.



## Installation

install the development version directly from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kkmann/adoptr")
```



## Documentation

the docs are at https://kkmann.github.io/adoptr/, a quickstart guide is 
given at https://kkmann.github.io/adoptr/articles/adoptr.html.
